# [[fool]], [[simpleton]]
#* '''18th century''', Cao Xueqin, ''Dream of the Red Chamber'', [[s:zh:紅樓夢/第065回|chapter 65 (in Chinese)]]:
#*: {{zh-x|尤二姐 滴淚 說道：“你們 拿 我 作 '''愚人''' 待， 什么 事 我 不 知。|Second Sister You said with tears dripping, “You treat me like a '''fool'''. Whatever it is, I do not know.}}
#* '''Tang Dynasty''', 毛诗序, ''诗经‧小雅‧鸿雁之什‧鸿雁'', [[s:zh:诗经/鸿雁|third line (in Chinese)]]:
#*: {{zh-x|鴻雁 于 飛、哀鳴 嗷嗷。維 此 哲人、謂 我 劬勞。維 彼 '''愚人'''、謂 我 宣驕。|The wild geese are flying about, and melancholy is their cry of ao-ao. There were they, wise men, who recognized our pain and toil; If they had been '''stupid men''', They would have said we were proclaiming our insolence.}}
